title: Faithful departed
creator_credit: Des Hickey, B.A.C. Films Ltd (Ireland) and Kieran Hickey
brief_description: Life in Dublin in the early years of the 20th Century as shown in selected contemporary photographs. Discusses James Joyce’s early life and shows the setting of his novel Ulysses in the city as he knew it. Commentary by Jack MacGowran.
creator_credit_for_label: Des Hickey, B.A.C. Films Ltd (Ireland) and Kieran Hickey
